```{r}
library(tidyverse)

data <- read_csv("D:/Downloads/medication_adherence_dataset_generated.csv")

adh_df <- read_csv("D:/Downloads/adherence_individual_level_dataset_122.csv")

```

```{r}
glimpse(adh_df)
```

```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(stringr)

adh_tf <- adh_df %>%
  mutate(
    across(
      where(is.character),
      ~ factor(str_remove(.x, "^[a-d]\\)\\s*"))
    )
  )

```


```{r}
library(gtsummary)
```


```{r}
tbl_adh <- adh_tf %>%
  tbl_summary(
    statistic = all_categorical() ~ "{n} ({p}%)",
    missing = "no",
    label = labels_list
  )

```
